title: Medical Funds for Colvin Broome
content:
Colvin Broome 3 yrs old suffered a gunshot would to the head December 5, 2016. The toddler is in a medically induced coma at the Sanford's Children Hospital in Fargo, ND.
We are raising funds for Medical expenses, and emergency expenses for his parents to stay by his side
in the Intensive Care Unit.
All donations and urgent prayers are greatly appreaciated at this time.
